headline: Show HN: Kaiju – Audio Visualisation System
description:
My new audio visualisation app Kaiju has just been released on Steam.

Designed as a more relaxed spiritual successor to Milkdrop it works on realtime system audio. Windows only at the moment unfortunately, but next on the roadmap is cross platform support and microphone audio input.

I hope you will enjoy it and if so, come say hello on discord:

https://discord.com/invite/45yymHzf38
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 凯居--音频可视化系统
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 凱居--音頻可視化系統
